creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: gnarled branch of a blossoming tree arching across lower portion of scroll, with vertical branches stretching upward; inscription ULQ
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals

Inscription ULQ: [Getting up on a frosty morning, / I don\'t mind the chill, but chant poetry softly, / leaning on the green balustrade. / Does the icy beauty have romantic longing too? / She emanates pure fragrance onto my morning coiffure.]
markings: ULQ: [Tennen]; [Sato no in]; [Shuran]; LRQ: [Seishuku]; [Chukyo] | Bokyo |  (for calligraphy)
signed: Signed LRC: [Painted by Nakabayashi Seishuku] (Nakabayashi Seishuku sha-su); signed ULQ: [Composed by Shuran Joshi]
title: Plum Tree
